name: Smallthought Systems
overview: Smallthought Systems, Inc. helps clients to create online databases on the Web. It offers a Web-based application that lets users to create reports, sort and group data, collaborate with others, filter data, create formulas and subtotals, pivot tables, design forms, and share and collect data, as well as prepare calendars, charts, and maps. The companyâ€™s Web based application is used in tracking sales and invoices, contacts and customer relationship management, project management, timesheets, personnel records, tracking workflow, surveys and reviews, basic statistical analysis, and general content management, as well as scheduling events, classes, and work shifts. Smallthought Systems, Inc. was founded in 2005 and is based in Vancouver, Canada. As of June 10, 2010, Smallthought Systems, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Twitter, Inc.

acquisition.source_description: Twitter Buys Analytics Startup Smallthought Systems
